name: Mini Star Fishing
description:
Have a relaxing time catching cute and colorful fish with fully controllable fishing rod. Upgrade your character and buy better boats. Buy a spaceship and head into space to fishing in space. Or, buy a submarine and go fishing in the deep sea. And fill the fish DEX.

I hope you have a comfortable and relaxing time.

Features

  • Fully controllable fishing rod at your own pace
  • River & Sea, deep sea and space fishing content
  • 200 kinds of cute and colorful fish
  • Beautiful and colorful visuals
  • Cool boats, submarines and spaceships
  • Colorful and sparkling 13 Stages
  • Comfortable and relaxing music
